languages.text: "Оправдываться перед чужаками... не думал, что однажды паду так низко". {n}Старик оборачивается на недвижимую девушку и обреченно трясет головой.{/n} "Если бы не сохранность Дитя... Ладно, выбора у меня все равно нет. Как и доказательств своей невиновности".

traits.locale_text: "Оправдываться перед чужаками... не думал, что однажды паду так низко". {n}Старик оборачивается на недвижимую девушку и обреченно трясет головой.{/n} "Если бы не сохранность Дитя... Ладно, выбора у меня все равно нет. Как и доказательств своей невиновности".

languages.text: "Defending myself before strangers... I never thought I would fall so low." {n}The old man looks at the unmoving Cassia and shakes his head in resignation.{/n} "If the Child's life were not at stake... Very well, I have no choice. Or proof of my innocence."
languages.original_text: "Оправдываться перед чужаками... не думал, что однажды паду так низко". {n}Старик оборачивается на недвижимую девушку и обреченно трясет головой.{/n} "Если бы не сохранность Дитя... Ладно, выбора у меня все равно нет. Как и доказательств своей невиновности".

traits.locale_text: "Defending myself before strangers... I never thought I would fall so low." {n}The old man looks at the unmoving Cassia and shakes his head in resignation.{/n} "If the Child's life were not at stake... Very well, I have no choice. Or proof of my innocence."

"Defending myself before strangers... I never thought I would fall so low." {n}The old man looks at the unmoving Cassia and shakes his head in resignation.{/n} "If the Child's life were not at stake... Very well, I have no choice. Or proof of my innocence."

"Defending myself before strangers... I never thought I would fall so low." {n}The old man looks at the unmoving Cassia and shakes his head in resignation.{/n} "If the Child's life were not at stake... Very well, I have no choice. Or proof of my innocence."

"Defending myself before strangers... I never thought I would fall so low." {n}The old man looks at the unmoving Cassia and shakes his head in resignation.{/n} "If the Child's life were not at stake... Very well, I have no choice. Or proof of my innocence."

languages.text: “要在陌生人面前自证清白……真没想到，我居然会沦落到这种地步。”{n}老人看着一动不动的卡西娅，无奈地摇了摇头。{/n}“要是圣子的生命没有受到威胁就好了……好吧，我别无选择。我并没有证据能证明我的清白。”
languages.original_text: "Defending myself before strangers... I never thought I would fall so low." {n}The old man looks at the unmoving Cassia and shakes his head in resignation.{/n} "If the Child's life were not at stake... Very well, I have no choice. Or proof of my innocence."

traits.locale_text: “要在陌生人面前自证清白……真没想到，我居然会沦落到这种地步。”{n}老人看着一动不动的卡西娅，无奈地摇了摇头。{/n}“要是这孩子的生命没有受到威胁就好了……好吧，我别无选择。我并没有证据能证明我的清白。”

languages.text: «Defenderme frente a desconocidos... nunca imaginé que caería tan bajo». {n}El anciano observa a la inmóvil Cassia y niega con la cabeza, resignado.{/n} «Si no fuera porque la vida de la niña está en juego... Muy bien, no tengo elección. Ni pruebas de mi inocencia».
languages.original_text: "Defending myself before strangers... I never thought I would fall so low." {n}The old man looks at the unmoving Cassia and shakes his head in resignation.{/n} "If the Child's life were not at stake... Very well, I have no choice. Or proof of my innocence."

traits.locale_text: «Defenderme frente a desconocidos... nunca imaginé que caería tan bajo». {n}El anciano observa a la inmóvil Cassia y niega con la cabeza, resignado.{/n} «Si no fuera porque la vida de la niña está en juego... Muy bien, no tengo elección. Ni pruebas de mi inocencia».

languages.text: 「見知らぬ者の前で保身に走るとは…私はここまで己が落ちぶれるとは思わなかった」{n}老人は動かないカシアを見て、諦めたように首を振る。 {/n}『子ども』の命がかかっていなければ…そうか、私に選択肢はない。無実を証明することもな」
languages.original_text: "Defending myself before strangers... I never thought I would fall so low." {n}The old man looks at the unmoving Cassia and shakes his head in resignation.{/n} "If the Child's life were not at stake... Very well, I have no choice. Or proof of my innocence."

traits.locale_text: 「見知らぬ者の前で保身に走るとは…私はここまで己が落ちぶれるとは思わなかった」{n}老人は動かないカシアを見て、諦めたように首を振る。 {/n}『子ども』の命がかかっていなければ…そうか、私に選択肢はない。無実を証明することもな」

languages.text: "Mich vor Fremden zu verteidigen ... Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass ich einmal so tief sinken würde." {n}Der alte Mann blickt die reglose Cassia an und schüttelt resigniert den Kopf.{/n} "Würde nicht das Leben des Kindes auf dem Spiel stehen ... Also gut, ich habe keine Wahl. Und keinen Beweis meiner Unschuld."
languages.original_text: "Defending myself before strangers... I never thought I would fall so low." {n}The old man looks at the unmoving Cassia and shakes his head in resignation.{/n} "If the Child's life were not at stake... Very well, I have no choice. Or proof of my innocence."

traits.locale_text: "Mich vor Fremden zu verteidigen ... Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass ich einmal so tief sinken würde." {n}Der alte Mann blickt die reglose Cassia an und schüttelt resigniert den Kopf.{/n} "Würde nicht das Leben des Kindes auf dem Spiel stehen ... Also gut, ich habe keine Wahl. Und keinen Beweis meiner Unschuld."

languages.text: « Devoir me justifier face à des inconnus... Jamais je n'aurais pensé tomber aussi bas. » {n}Le vieil homme regarde le corps inerte de Cassia et secoue la tête d'un air résigné.{/n} « Si la vie de l'Enfant n'était pas en jeu... Très bien, je n'ai pas le choix, ni la preuve de mon innocence. »
languages.original_text: "Defending myself before strangers... I never thought I would fall so low." {n}The old man looks at the unmoving Cassia and shakes his head in resignation.{/n} "If the Child's life were not at stake... Very well, I have no choice. Or proof of my innocence."

traits.locale_text: « Devoir me justifier face à des inconnus... Jamais je n'aurais pensé tomber aussi bas. » {n}Le vieil homme regarde le corps inerte de Cassia et secoue la tête d'un air résigné.{/n} « Si la vie de l'Enfant n'était pas en jeu... Très bien, je n'ai pas le choix, ni la preuve de mon innocence. »

languages.text: "Kendimi yabancıların karşısında savunmak zorunda kalıyorum. Bu kadar alçalacağım aklıma gelmezdi." {n}İhtiyar adam, hareketsiz duran Cassia'ya bakıyor ve kabullenir bir tavırla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Çocuk'un canı söz konusu olmasa... Peki. Ne başka seçeneğim ne de masumiyetimi kanıtlayacak delilim var."
languages.original_text: "Defending myself before strangers... I never thought I would fall so low." {n}The old man looks at the unmoving Cassia and shakes his head in resignation.{/n} "If the Child's life were not at stake... Very well, I have no choice. Or proof of my innocence."

Ne başka seçeneğim ne de masumiyetimi kanıtlayacak delilim var."
